title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the perfect hearing protection for your shooting range adventures. These earmuffs feature high-definition speakers that deliver superior sound quality. 

With a sound activation system that reacts in just 0.02 seconds and independent volume controls, you can customize your listening experience with ease. The noise reduction rating of 23 dB ensures that you can enjoy your shooting sessions without any distractions.

Equipped with two omnidirectional microphones, these earmuffs provide clear and accurate sound detection. The built-in audio input jack allows you to connect your favorite devices and listen to your preferred music or podcasts while staying protected.

Controlling the volume is a breeze with the recessed knobs, ensuring that you can adjust it to your desired level effortlessly. Powered by two AAA batteries (included), these earmuffs are ready to use right out of the box.

The dimensions of these earmuffs are 8.10 inches in length, 4.60 inches in width, and 10.60 inches in height. Weighing only 0.98 pounds, they are lightweight and comfortable to wear for extended periods. The metal wire frame headband provides excellent comfort, and the foldable design allows for easy storage.

The housing of these earmuffs is made of composite material, which effectively dampens sound for an enhanced shooting experience. 

Upgrade your shooting range gear with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs and enjoy the perfect combination of comfort, protection, and exceptional sound quality.

Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the perfect solution for your hearing protection needs, especially at the shooting range. These earmuffs are designed to provide you with the utmost comfort and exceptional performance.

Featuring high-definition speakers, you can experience crystal-clear audio while ensuring your hearing is protected. The sound activation technology in these earmuffs has a compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds, which means you can enjoy uninterrupted audio without compromising on safety. Additionally, the independent volume controls allow you to customize the sound levels according to your preference.

With a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs effectively reduce the intensity of loud noises, ensuring your ears are shielded from harmful sounds. The two omnidirectional microphones provide excellent sound quality and enable you to stay aware of your surroundings.

For added convenience, these earmuffs come with an audio input jack, allowing you to connect your favorite devices and enjoy your music or podcasts while staying protected. The recessed knobs on the volume control provide easy access and allow you to make precise adjustments effortlessly.

Powering these earmuffs is a pair of AAA batteries, which are included with your purchase. The dimensions of the earmuffs measure 8.10 inches in length, 4.60 inches in width, and 10.60 inches in height, making them compact and portable. Weighing only 0.98 pounds, you can wear them comfortably for extended periods without feeling any strain.

The headband of these earmuffs is designed with your comfort in mind. It features a metal wire frame that ensures durability and a snug fit. The foldable design allows for easy storage and portability, making them a convenient choice for any shooter.

The housing of the earmuffs is made from composite material, which effectively dampens sound, further enhancing your experience. 

Upgrade your shooting range sessions with the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Get yours today and enjoy superior hearing protection without compromising on audio quality.

Introducing the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the perfect solution for your hearing protection needs, especially when you're at the shooting range. These earmuffs are designed with high-definition speakers to provide exceptional sound quality, ensuring you don't miss any important audio cues. 

Equipped with advanced sound activation technology, the earmuffs have a compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds, allowing you to hear even the faintest sounds while still protecting your hearing. Plus, with independent volume controls, you have the flexibility to adjust the volume of each ear cup separately to suit your preferences.

Featuring a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs effectively block out loud noises, ensuring your ears are shielded from harmful sound levels. The omnidirectional microphones, of which there are two, capture sound from all directions, providing you with an immersive audio experience.

For added convenience, these earmuffs come with an audio input jack, allowing you to connect your device and enjoy your favorite music or podcasts while still maintaining situational awareness. The recessed knobs on the volume control provide a sleek and easy-to-use interface for adjusting the volume.

Powering these earmuffs is a pair of AAA batteries, two of which are included in the package, ensuring you have everything you need to start using them right away. The earmuffs are lightweight, weighing just 0.98 pounds, and have compact dimensions of 8.1 inches in length, 4.6 inches in width, and 10.6 inches in height.

Designed with your comfort in mind, the earmuffs feature a metal wire frame headband that offers a comfortable fit even during extended use. The foldable design allows for easy storage and portability, so you can take them with you wherever you go.

The housing of these earmuffs is made of composite material, which not only provides durability but also contributes to sound dampening, further enhancing your listening experience. 

Upgrade your hearing protection with the Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Don't compromise on comfort, quality, or functionality. Order yours today and enjoy a safer and more enjoyable shooting range experience.
